name: Murder Mansion 3 - start a puzzle challenge
name_original: Murder Mansion 3 - start a puzzle challenge
description:
Welcome to Murder Mansion 3 - a cool escape game!

Do you think you have the skills with Murder Mansion 3 - a cool escape game?

You have been appointed as the private detective agent, you first job as detective is assigned to mansion where crime has occurred and you need to what make the criminal to make crime and find the criminal by the clues and object left by him. Murder mansion 3 games is one of the best adventure escape game in BAMVD games

Friends do you like taking up challenges in your life? Have you ever been in a mostly challenging situations ever before? If no and you like to be in one then here is your chance to be in the mostly challenging game in your life. All you need to do is solve puzzles.
